text: is there anyone here, based in New Zealand or Australia, with experience in API connections between HubSpot and ITQuoter? <https://itquoter.com/>

Hi Nick, thanks for your reply. The problem is that private applications do not have visibility from the workflow area

Can someone help me understand why do we have Create CRM Contact API & Create New Contact API?
Both are creating contact under same Contacts Table. Why do we have 2 APIs & What're the diffs?
Create CRM Contact  : POST*`/crm/v3/objects/contacts`*
Create New Contact : POST `/contacts/v1/contact`
Thanks in advance!!
Thanks Tim.
I think it's only because you're working with V1 vs V3
there aren't two ways to create a contact for the same versions of the APi

Hello everyone,
I would like to access the API of notes, email and calls to export this data to another programme I am using.
I have asked the support of HubSpot if they could tell me how to create the needed developers account and they said I should ask here...

Also I have a HubSpot account from where I would like to get the information through the API so maybe I can create the developers account linked to that existing account? I am absolutely lost on this.

Thanks for your help!
Do you want to create a public app listed on the marketplace? or is this a one time job? if its a one time job you dont need a dev account.
It is a one time job, which means I want to access the API read once all the data and thats it...
Just create an api key or a private app and search the documentation that you need
documentation is good, has examples in most used languages
ok great thank you so much

Here it is <@U03LXCW8LFK> <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/engagements>

It's in beta but as you are looking for 1 time export you can use those endpoints and check if data is sufficient for you.
Can i add the hs_call_direction field to the legacy engagements metadata object?
I found a scope that seems to work. There is a crm.lists.read scope
how to add a reminder in a task? engagements/v1/engagements

hi <@U02JE0QQCG4> you might follow this - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Create-a-task-with-reminder-using-the-API/m-p/295542#:~:text=To%20create%20a%20reminder%20using,the%20metadata%20for%20the%20engagement.&text=Related%20to%20the%20scheduled%20date,field%20in%20the%20engagement%20body>.

Hello everyone, I am trying to integrate HubSpot CRM with my app. I was searching for an API that would return me the list of teams along with the team hierarchy. The endpoint "/settings/v3/users/teams" lists all the teams but I do not see how do I create a team hierarchy out of it. Can someone help me out here? Thank you.
